abstract: With a deadline looming in the bank bailout program, Washington regulators are pressing unwelcome prescriptions on Bank of America and Citigroup.
snippet: With a deadline looming in the bank bailout program, Washington regulators are pressing unwelcome prescriptions on Bank of America and Citigroup.
lead_paragraph: With a crucial deadline looming in the federal bank bailout program, Washington regulators are pressing some unwelcome prescriptions on two of the largest U.S. lenders, The New York Times’s Edmund L. Andrews and Louise Story report.

headline.main: Regulators Push for Change at 2 Troubled Banks

abstract: UBS said Monday that it has hired William Newby from Bank of America to lead its gaming and leisure banking group in the Americas.
snippet: UBS said Monday that it has hired William Newby from Bank of America to lead its gaming and leisure banking group in the Americas.
lead_paragraph: UBS said Monday that it had hired William Newby from Bank of America to lead its gambling and leisure banking group in the Americas. Mr. Newby will be based in Los Angeles and report to Jackson Hsieh, global head of real estate investment banking at UBS.

headline.main: UBS Hires Banker to Lead Gambling Group in Americas

abstract: Bank of America disclosed late Monday that two more directors resigned from its board, bringing the total to five who have left since April.
snippet: Bank of America disclosed late Monday that two more directors resigned from its board, bringing the total to five who have left since April.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America disclosed late Monday that two more directors resigned from its board, bringing the total to five who have left since April.

headline.main: 2 More Bank of America Directors Leave Board
